articles.description:
1. Fadnavis to announce BJP's next plan, Uddhav asked to continue until oath-taking  Hindustan Times
  2. Maharashtra political crisis: As workers celebrate, BJP meets to decide on action plan  The Indian Express
  3. As Uddhav Thackeray Resign…
articles.content: Maharashtra BJP leader Devendra Fadnavis, tipped to become the chief minister of the state again, following the dramatic resignation of Uddhav Thackeray, on Wednesday said the future course of action… [+1954 chars]
